name: HetaOni: Italy's Story
description:
PLEASE READ

...

A GAME OF FANFICTION WITH THE SAME TITLE

"What really happened in the Mansion? What exactly did Italy actually go through? What if the loop from the game ended in death and failure again? What if it was only the beginning? Play and watch as Italy goes through the Mansion after the game's loop. Follow the Angst of having to protect everyone without them knowing it. And see just how shattered Italy has become. Will they finally escape? Or will Feliciano be forever tormented by the halls and monsters of the Forbidden Mansion?"

~ original fanfiction summary

Genre: Horror (?)

Rating: T+

Completion time: ~30-40 Minutes

WARNINGS: Language, Blood, Death, Dark Themes

~~~

Oh boy, this really took longer than it should. If you want to download it for some extra crazy blood-spilling action - I'm gonna unfortunately break your hopes. For now, it's only the prologue and 1st chapter, which means nothing of that kind happens yet. In fact, like 90% of this is dialogue (mostly Italy's monologue), but I PROMISE, most of it is gonna be important for the later chapters in order to understand some things. 

Please support the original creator of the story by giving her kudos or stars on AO3 or Wattpad!!

Her work is amazing and I definitely recommend it!

SOME INFO

  • This won't work on Mac and Chromebooks.
  • RTP is already in the folder! There's no need to download it.
  • If you repost anything from the game, please give proper credits to original creators!
  • Any form of fanwork is allowed, no need to ask for permission (but if it's an original character, at least give credit to the creator)!

Yes, this is not ideal. It's my first ever game and I did try my best, however, if you find any bugs, please contact me!

Alternative DOWNLOAD
(If there are any problems with download, just comment and I'll try my best to help!)

HOPE YOU ENJOY~!
